p: The relative granularity of this approach contrasts with the more high-level 2015 SDG on HIV (3.3): ‘By 2030, end the epidemics of AIDS…’, with the target indicator (3.3.1): ‘Number of new HIV infections per 1,000 uninfected population, by sex, age and key populations’ [ 83, 84]. Like the MDG target, the epidemiological measure defining the epidemic’s end is not explicitly stated.
